MAAMTA LW TRIAL
BOTh
Is LW alive?
LW zinda ha
Date of death
Agar LW ka intiqaal ho gaya tu us k tareekh
Time of death
Intiqaal ka waqt
Is baby alive?
Bacha zinda ha
Date of death
Agar bachay ka intiqaal ho gaya tu us k tareekh
Time of death
Intiqaal ka waqt
Age of the baby on day of visit System generated
Jis din visit k ha bachay ko us din bachay k umer dinoun ma Yeh system khud fill karay ga
Did you give anything to drink or eat during this hour to the baby?
Kya is ganty k doran apny bachay ko kuch peene ya khanay ko dia?
Was baby given a breastfeed during this specific hour?
Kiya bachay ko is khas ghantay main ma aka doodh pilaya giya?
Ask the mother, how many times, did baby has a breastfeed, during this specific hour, like between 06:00 am to 07:00 am. If only one time, write 1, if two times, write 2 and so on

Maa, se poochain k is khas ghnatay main bachay ko kitni baar doodh pilaya giya. Misaal k tor pe subah 6 se 7 k darmiyan bachay ko Maa k doodh pilaya giya, to kitni baar, aik baar ya Do baar, ya teen bar, jitni baar bhe pilaya giya, jama kar k likhain
Breast milk type
Mother’s own (Maa ka apna tha)
Someone else’s \nbachay ko kisi aur aurat na dhood pilaya ha
Maa na bachay ko dhood pilaya ha tu kya wo
Side of breast used for breastfeeding at this specific time
Jis muqarar waqt pay dhood pilaya ha us ma maa na kis side k breast sa dhood pilaya ha
Methods used for breastfeeding at this specific time
Direct from breast (breast sa)
Expressed the breast milk and given by cup and spoon(Dhood ko breast sa nikal k chamchay ya cup sa)
Expressed the breast milk and given by bottle (Dhoodh ko breast sa nikal k and feeder bottle sa diya)
Kis tarhan maa na bachay ko dhood pilaya ha
Total time duration, the baby was breastfed at this specific time
Muqarar waqt pay bachay na kitni dair k dhood peeya
Type of spoon used
Tea spoon (Chai wala chamcha)
Tablespoon (Chawal khanay wala chamcha)
Cotton piece (Roi ka tukray sa)
Dropper (Qatray peelnay walay sa)
Agar bachay ko chamchay sa dhood diya ha tu wo kon sa tha
How much amount is given (Approximate)
Kitni miqdar ma dhood diya
Did the enrolled baby vomit immediately (Half an hour) after feeding?
Kya bachay ko ulti tu nahi hoi dhood pilanay k foran baad
How much feed did the baby vomit?
All of the feed
Half of the feed
Small amount
Agar bachay ko ulti hoi tu kitni dair baad hoi dhood pilanay k baad

Was there any other baby (specifically ask for other siblings or children at home) who was breastfed by this enrolled LW during this specific hour? There is a chance that mother is also breastfeeding her other under-five children or other kids at home.(DO NOT INCLUDE AN ENROLLED BABY)
Kya is bachay k saaath saath maa na kisi aur ko bh dhood pilaya ha jis k umer 5 saal sa kaam ho, yeh us maa and bachay k liya ha jo hamari study ma enrolled han
Number of children who were breastfed by the enrolled LW at this specific hour (DO NOT INCLUDE AN ENROLLED BABY)
LW na kitnay bachoun ko dhood pilaya ha pichaly 1 ghantay ma

During this specific hour, was baby given anything which was cooked at home (A recipe) For example , Soji ka Halwa, Sagoo danay Ke Kheer, EXCEPT breast milk? If same thing give more than two times, count it a one.

Is khas ghantay main, kiya bachay ko ghar pe kuch paka k khanay ya peenay k liye diya giya. Jaisay k: Soji ka Halwa, Sagoo danay Ke Kheer. Ager aik he cheez aik khas ghantay main aik se ziyda baar degaye hai, to usko aik ke baar ginti man laayen.
Where this recipe was made or cooked?
Own home (apna ghar ma)
Somewhere else (ya Kahin aur)
Bachay ko khilay Janay wali cheez kahan tayar k gay th
Recipe name/description which was given to a baby during this specific hour?
Us cheez ka naam jo paka k dee gaye
Code of the recipe used
Uss cheez ka code jo paka k dee gaye
Portion size description
Kis cheez se wo cheez khilaye ya pilaaye gaye
Amount used in gram
Kitni Mikqaar main de gaye

During this specific hour, was baby given any other thing which was cooked at home (A recipe) For example , Soji ka Halwa, Sagoo danay Ke Kheer, EXCEPT breast milk? If same thing was given more than two times, count it a one. EXCEPT breast milk, which is different from Q42?There is a chance that mother gave the same thing more than once within this specific hour, count it as one and right cumulative quantity.

Is khas ghantay main, kiya bachay ko ghar pe kuch paka k khanay ya peenay k liye diya giya. Jaisay k: Soji ka Halwa, Sagoo danay Ke Kheer. Ager aik he cheez aik khas ghantay main aik se ziyda baar degaye hai, to usko aik ke baar ginti man laayen. Jo ka Q42 se mukhtalif ho Aaisa mumkin hai k maan ne bachay ko kuch aur bhe paka k diya h Agar aik he cheez aik he ghantay mai aik se ziyada baar de gaye to jama karlain
Where this recipe was made or cooked?
Own home (apna ghar ma)
Somewhere else(ya Kahin aur)
Bachay ko khilay Janay wali cheez kahan tayar k gay th
Recipe name/description which was given to a baby during this specific hour?
Us cheez ka naam jo paka k dee gaye
Code of the recipe used (Use codes from the manual)
Uss cheez ka code jo paka k dee gaye(code manual s istmal kare)
Portion size description (Use terms as per manual. Like bottle, ml teaspoon, tablespoon etc)
Kis cheez se wo cheez khilaye ya pilaaye gaye (jo manual m terms h wo user kare. Jese k bottle, teaspoon, tablespoon etc)
Amount used in gram
Kitni Mikqaar main de gaye grams m likhy

During this specific hour, was baby given any other thing which was cooked at home (A recipe) For example , Soji ka Halwa, Sagoo danay Ke Kheer, EXCEPT breast milk? If same thing was given more than two times, count it a one. EXCEPT breast milk, which is different from Q42 and Q48? There is a chance that mother gave the same thing more than once within this specific hour, count it as one and right cumulative quantity.

Is khas ghantay main, kiya bachay ko ghar pe kuch paka k khanay ya peenay k liye diya giya. Jaisay k: Soji ka Halwa, Sagoo danay Ke Kheer. Ager aik he cheez aik khas ghantay main aik se ziyda baar degaye hai, to usko aik ke baar ginti man laayen. Jo ka Q42 aur 48 se mukhtalif ho Aaisa mumkin hai k maan ne bachay ko kuch aur bhe paka k diya ho Agar aik he cheez aik he ghantay mai aik se ziyada baar de gaye to jama karlain
Where this recipe was made or cooked?
Bachay ko khilay Janay wali cheez kahan tayar k gay th
Recipe name/description which was given to a baby during this specific hour?
Us cheez ka naam jo paka k dee gaye
Code of the recipe used
Uss cheez ka code jo paka k dee gay
Portion size description
Kis cheez se wo cheez khilaye ya pilaaye gaye
Amount used in gram
Kitni Mikqaar main de gaye
Was a specific food item e.g. goat milk, juice, banana, biscuit, Fruit juice, Formula milk, Ceralac etc used? If same thing given more than once in an hour, count it as one

Kiya is khas ghantay main bachay ko koi aisi cheez de gaye jis ko pakana na parta ho, jaisay k Bakri ka doodh, formula milk, Joose, Kaila, Biscuit, Ceralac WAGAIRA.Agar aik he cheez aik he ghantay mai aik se ziyada baar de gaye to jama karlain
Name of food item which was given to the baby during this specific hour?
Uss khanay ke cheez ka naam
Code of food item used
Us khanay ke cheez ka code
Portion size description
Kis size ya cheez se de gaye
Amount used in gram
Kitni miqdaar de gaye

Was any other specific food item e.g. goat milk, juice, banana, biscuit, Fruit juice, Formula milk, Ceralac etc used? If same thing given more than once in an hour, count it as one. Should be different from Q59
Kiya is khas ghantay main bachay ko koi aisi cheez de gaye jis ko pakana na parta ho, jaisay k Bakri ka doodh, formula milk, Joose, Kaila, Biscuit, Ceralac WAGAIRA. Q59 se mikhtalif
There is a chance that mother gave the same thing more than once within this specific hour, count it as one and right cumulative quantity.
Agar aik he cheez aik he ghantay mai aik se ziyada baar de gaye to jama karlain
Name of food item which was given to the baby during this specific hour?
Uss khanay ke cheez ka naam
Code of food item used
Us khanay ke cheez ka code
Portion size description
Kis size ya cheez se de gaye
Amount used in gram
Kitni miqdaar de gaye

Was any other specific food item e.g. goat milk, juice, banana, biscuit, Fruit juice, Formula milk, Ceralac etc used? If same thing given more than once in an hour, count it as one. Should be different from Q59 and Q64
Kiya is khas ghantay main bachay ko koi aisi cheez de gaye jis ko pakana na parta ho, jaisay k Bakri ka doodh, formula milk, Joose, Kaila, Biscuit, Ceralac WAGAIRA. Q59 se mikhtalif
There is a chance that mother gave the same thing more than once within this specific hour, count it as one and right cumulative quantity.
Agar aik he cheez aik he ghantay mai aik se ziyada baar de gaye to jama karlain
Name of food item which was given to the baby during this specific hour?
Uss khanay ke cheez ka naam
Code of food item used
Us khanay ke cheez ka code
Portion size description
Kis size ya cheez se de gaye
Amount used in gram
Kitni miqdaar de gaye
Plain water
sada pani
Sugar water
Chini Wala Pani
Grip water
Grip water
Kehwa extract
Kehwa extract
Hookah water
Hookah water
Was the baby given any of these items (Non-food item) during this specific hour? Multiple answer allowed
Ghutti
Ghutti
Rose water or similar water
gulab ka pani ya us jesa kuch
Any herbal water
koi herbal pani
Honey/honey water
shahid ya shahid wala pani
Other
Koi or
Kiya bachay ko koi aisi cheez de gaye jis main jo k Ghiza nah o, jaisay k paani, Ghutti, Gari Booti wagaira
Breast milk provides all the food and water that your baby needs during the first 6 months.
Maa k dhood bachay ko khuraq aur pani donoun faraham karta ha jitni bachay k zarorat hoti pehlay 6 mahinay tak
Do not give anything else, not even water, during your baby’s first 6 months.
Pehlay 6 mahinay tak bachay ko maa k dhood k ilawa khuch aur nahi daina chahiya, yahan tak k pani bh nahi
Even during very hot weather, breast milk will satisfy your baby’s thirst.
Shadeed garmi ma bh ma aka dhood bachay ko peeyas sa mehfooz rakhta ha
Giving your baby anything else will cause him/her to suckle less and will reduce the amount of breast milk that you produce.
Agar maa bachay ko apnay dhood k illawa khuch aur day gee tu us sa aik tu bachy k maa ka dhood peenay k salahiyat kamzor paray gee and dosra maa ko dhood bh kaam ai ga
Water, other liquids and foods can make the baby sick.
Pani, dosray mashroob and upper sa di hoi khorak app k bachay ko beemar kar day gee
Importance of Exclusive Breastfeeding
You can give medicines if they are recommended by your health provider.
Bachay ko agar doctor k mashwaray k baad koi deewai dainay k zarorat paray tu wo di ja sakti ha
Exclusive breastfeeding means feeding your baby ONLY breast milk for the first 6 months.
Exclusive breastfeeding ka matlab hota ha zindagi k pehlay 6 mahinay tak bachay ko sirf aur sirf ma aka dhood pilana
Exclusive breastfeeding for the first 6 months protects your baby from many illnesses, such as diarrhoea and respiratory infections.
Pehlay 6 mahinay tak bachay ko sirf aur sirf ma aka dhood pilanay sa bacha bhoot sari beemarioun sa mehfooz rehta ha maslan dasst aur sans k beemarian
Mixed feeding means feeding your baby both breast milk and any other foods or liquids, including infant formula, animal milks, or water.
Mixed feeding ka matlab hota ha bachay ko maa k dhood k saath saath koi aur khoraq aur peenay k cheez maslan dabay ka dhood, gai/bakri ka dhood ya pani daina
Mixed feeding before 6 months can damage your baby’s stomach.
6 mahinay sa pehlay mixed feeding sa bachay k pait par bura asar par sakta ha
Mixed feeding increases the chances that your baby will suffer from illnesses such as diarrhoea and pneumonia, and from malnutrition.
Bhoot mumkin ha mixed feeding sa bachay zayda beemar rahay and us ko pait k beemarian , namoonia ka khatra ho and wo ghazai kilaat ka shikar rahay

Giving your baby foods or any kind of liquids other than breast milk, including infant formula, animal milks, or water before 6 months can damage your baby’s stomach. This reduces the protection that exclusive breastfeeding gives, and all of the benefits that your baby gets from your breast milk.

6 mahinay sa pehlay bachay ko maa k dhood k ilawa koi aur cheez dainay sa bhoot mumkin ha bacha pait k beemarioun ma mubtila rahay. Dabay ka dhood, gai /bakri ka dhood bachay k quwat e meedafiyat ko kamzor kar daita ha, jis k waha sa bacha aksar beemar rehta ha. Ma aka dhood bachay ko bhoot c beemarioun sa mehfooz rakhta ha
Breastfeed on demand, both day and night (8 to 12 times) to build up your breast milk supply
Bachay ko maa ka dhood din ma 8 to 12 dafa daina lazmi ha, us sa maa ko dhood bh wafer miqdar ma ai ga

Crying is a late sign of hunger. Early signs that your baby wants to breastfeed include: 
a) Restlessness
b) Opening mouth and turning head from side-to-side
c) Putting tongue in and out
d) Suckling on fingers and fists

Bachay ka rona is baat k ilammat ha k bachay ko shadeed bhoot lagi ha. Behtar ha k bacha ko ronay sa pehlay hi maa k dhood milay, aur is surat ma bacha:\na) Baichan ho ga\nb) Apna moun kholay ga and apna sir idhar udhar goomai ga Moun sa zeban andar bahir karay gaApni unglian and kalaiyan choosay ga

Let your baby finish one breast before offering the other. Switching back and forth from one breast to the other prevents the baby from getting the nutritious ‘hind milk’. The ‘fore milk’ has more water and satisfies the baby’s thirst. The ‘hind milk’ has more fat and satisfies your baby’s hunger.

Bachay ko pehlay aik taraf sa poora dhood peenay dain, jaldi jaldi bachay k side change karnay sa bachay ko sahi dhood nahi milay ga jis ko baad ka dhood bola jata ha and wo dhood ghazaiyat sa bharpoor hota ha and asal ma bachay k bhook ko wohi khatam karta ha. Pehlay ana wala dhood sirf pani hota ha jis sa sirf bachay k peeyas kahatam hoti ha
Do NOT use bottles, teats or spouted cups. They are difficult to clean and can cause your baby to become sick
Dhood k botel, choosni and cups istimaal na karain. In cheezoun k safai ka khaas khayal rakhan parta ha and sahi safai na honay k soorat ma bacha beemar par sakta ha
If your baby is ill or sleepy, wake him or her to offer the breast often
Agar app ka bacha beemar ha ya so raha ha, tu us ko muqar waqt utha ka maa apna dhood pilai
Good positioning helps to ensure that your baby suckles well and helps you to produce a good supply of breast milk
Bachay k sahi position dhood pilatay waqt is liya zarori ha takay bacha sahi tarhan dhood pee sakay and maa ko sahi miqdar ma dhood ai

The four key points about your baby’s position are: straight, facing the breast, close, and supported:
a) The baby’s body should be straight, not bent or twisted, but with the head slightly back.
b) The baby’s body should be facing the breast, not held flat to your chest or stomach, and he or she should be able to look up into your face.
c) The baby should be close to you.
d) You should support the baby’s whole body, not just the neck and shoulders, with your hand and arm.

Chaar zarori hidaayat app k bachay k position k hawalay sa: seedha, moun maa k seenay k taraf, maa k qareeb and sahi tarhan pakra howa
a) Bacha seedha honay chahiya, na jhooka howa na moora howa, and bachay ka sir thora sa pichay k taraf
b) Bachay ka jisam thora sa upper k taraf ho takay us ka moun maa k seenay k qareeb ho, and bacha upper k taraf dheekay
c) Bachay maa sa qareeb ho
d) Bachay ko apnay haath and bazu k madad sa is tarhan pakray takay us k puray jisam ko sahara milay, khali garden aur kanday nahi

There are different ways to position your baby:
a) Cradle position (most commonly used)
b) Cross cradle position (good for small babies)
c) Side-lying position (use to rest while breastfeeding and at night)
d) Under-arm position (use after caesarean section, if your nipples are painful or if you are breastfeeding twins or a small baby)

Bachay ko pakarnay k mukhtalif tareeqay han:
a) Jhoolay wali position (Sab sa zayda kiya janay wala tareeqa))
b) Cross ma jhoolay wali position (chootay size k bachoun k zayda acha tareeqa)
c) Side pay lait k (Maa aram sa lait k bchay ko dhood pilai ya raat ma)
d) Operation k baad, ya agar maa ko nipples ma dard ho, ya jorrwa bachay ho, ya bacha chota ho
Key messages on good Breastfeeding positions
Good attachment helps to ensure that your baby suckles well and helps you to produce a good supply of breast milk.
Bacha maa k saath sahi tarha joora rahay us sa bachay ko dhood peenay ma asani hoti ha and maa ko achi miqdar ma dhood ata ha
Good attachment helps to prevent sore and cracked nipples and ensures that Breastfeeding should not be painful.
Is sa maa k breast ma soozish nahi hoti and nipples ma dard bh nahi hota
Get help to improve the attachment if you experience pain.
Mahir sa rabta karain agar app ko kisi bh kisam ka dard mahsoos ho bachay ko dhood pilatay waqt

There are 4 signs of good attachment:
a) Baby’s mouth is wide open
b) You can see more of the darker skin (areola) above the baby’s mouth than below
c) Baby’s lower lip is turned outwards
d) Baby’s chin is touching mother’s breast

Achi tarhan munsaliq honay k chaar zaroroi niqaat:
a) Bachay ka moun achi tarhan khula ho
b) Maa k breast ka jo gehra rung ka hissay ha wo bachay k moun k upper wali side sa zayda nazar ai ga nicchay wali side k muqabil
c) Bachay k nichay ka hount bahir k janib moray ho ga
d) Bachay k thoodi maa k breast ko touch karay gee

The signs of effective suckling are:
a) a) The baby takes slow deep suckles, sometimes pausing.
b) You may be able to see or hear your baby swallowing after one or two suckles.
c) Suckling is comfortable and pain free for you.
d) Your baby finishes the feed, releases the breast and looks contented and relaxed.
e) The breast is softer after the feed.

Bacha sahi tarhan dhood pee raha ha us k zarori niqaat:
a) Bacha ruk ruk k dhood peeta ha
b) Maa ko mahsoos ho ga k bacha aik ya do dafa choosnay k baad dhood andar lay kar jata ha
c) Bacha jab dhood pee raha ho ga tu maa ko kisi bh kisam ka dard nahi ho ga
d) Bacha jab pait bhar k dhood pee lay ga tu khudi sa peena chor day ga
e) Dhood peelanay ka baad breast naram ho jay ga
Key messages on good attachment
Effective suckling helps you to produce milk and satisfy your baby
Agar bacha sahi tareeqay sad hood piya ga tu maa ko acha and wafir miqdar ma dhood ai ga

After your baby releases one breast offer your baby the other breast. This will ensure that your baby stimulates your milk production in both breasts, and also gets the most nutritious and satisfying milk.
Jab bacha aik side say dhood pee lay tu us ko dosri side sa dhood pilain. Is ma maa ko doun sidoun sa wafir miqdar ma dhood ai jis sa bachay k nashurma bh achi ho gee
Guide the mother about Skin-to-skin contact: Kangaroo mother care provides skin-to-skin contact, warmth and closeness to the mother’s Breast
Maa ko batain k bachay ko apnay app sa joray rakhna kitna zarori ha, jis ko hum Kangaroo care kehtay han, is sa bacha garam rehta ha and apni maa sa qareeeb bh
Breast milk is especially adapted to the nutritional needs of low birth weight infants.
Maa ko dhood un bachoun k liya bay hud faida mund ha jin ka pidaish k waqat wazan kaam hota ha
The best milk for a low birth weight infant, including babies born early, is the breast milk from the baby’s own mother
Wo bachay jin ka pidaish k waqt wazan kaam ho, ya jo waqt sa pehlay paida ho jain un ko maa ka dhood hi sab sa zayda faida day ga
The cross cradle and underarm positions are good positions for feeding a low birth weight baby.
Jhoolay wali position ya under arm position sab sa behtareen tareeqa ha un bachoun k liya jin ka pidaish k waqt wazan kaam hota ha
Breastfeed frequently to get baby use to the breast and to keep the milk flowing.
Bachay ko zayda sa zayda maa ka dhood pilain takay bacha maa k dhood peenay ka adi ho jay and maa ko zayda sa zayda dhood ai
Exclusive breastfeeding of low birth weight babies
Long slow feeds are fine. It is important to keep the baby at the breast.
Zayda dair tak thora thora dhood ana sahi ha, zayda aham yeh ha k bacha ma aka dhood peeya
If the baby sleeps for long periods of time, you may need to unwrap the baby or take off some of his or her clothes to help waken him or her for the feed.
Agar bacha zayda dair tak sota ha tu maa ko chahiya k us ko dhood k time par jaga k dhood pilay chahay bachay ko neend sa jagana kyoun na paray
Breastfeed the baby before he or she starts to cry.
Bacha ko ronay sa pehlay dhood peela daina chahiya
Earlier signs of hunger include a combination of the following: being alert and restless, opening mouth and turning head, putting tongue in and out, sucking on hand or fist
Bacha ko jab bhook tu us k nishani hoti ha: Bacha baichan hog a, ana moun kholay ga and sir idhar udhar ghoomay ga, apni zeban moun sa andar bahir karay ga and apnay haath aur unglian choosay ga
Breastfeed more frequently during illness, including diarrhoea, to help the baby fight sickness, reduce weight loss and recover more quickly.
Bachay ko beemari k doran zayda sa zayda dhood peelana chahiya takay wo beemari sa lar sakay, us k quwat e madafiyat bharay, and jo wazan us ka beemari sa kaam howa wo us ko kami ko poora karay
Breastfeeding also provides comfort to your sick baby. If your baby refuses to breastfeed, encourage your baby until he or she takes the breast again.
Maa ka dhood peelanay sa beemar bachay aram sa rahay ga, aur agar bacha dhood na peeya tu phir bh maa ko chahiya k wo zabardasti maa ko apna dhood peelay
Give only breast milk and medicines recommended by your doctor/ health care provider.
Agar bachay ko koi dewai daini tu kisi mahir doctor k mashwara k bagair nahi dainai chahiya
If the baby is too weak to suckle, express breast milk to give the baby. This will help you to keep up your milk supply and prevent breast difficulties.
Agar bacha kamzor ha aur us ma maa ka dhood peenay k himaat nahi ho maa ko chahiya k haath sa dhood nikal k ussay pilai, is sa maa ko dhood ata rahay ga and breast ma koi masla bh nahi ho ga
After each illness, increase the frequency of breastfeeding to help your baby regain health and weight.
Beemari k baad bachay ko maa apna dhood zayda sa zayda peelai takay bachay k sehat jaldi bahal ho jay
Feeding the sick baby less than 6 months of age
6. When you are sick, you can continue to breastfeed your baby. You may need extra food and support during this time.
Agar maa khud beemar ha tu wo bachay ko phir bh apna dhood pila sakti ha, is surat ma maa ko chahiya k wo apni giza ka khayal rakhay

Since last visit by Newborn team, was baby had any danger sign, complication, problem or disease for which he or she was take to any health facility or self treatment given or may be nothing was done?

Pichli dafa sa lay kar ab tak jab new born team na visit kiya tha tu kya bachay ko khatray k koi aalmaat zahir hoi, ya us ko kisi aur maslay k waja sa ilaj k liya hospital jana para ya khud sa kisi na us ka ilaj kiya, ya phir khuch bh nahi kiya gaya?
Koi aur masla
Difficulty in feeding
Dhood peenay ma duhswari
Cough
Khaansi
Cold/Flu/Runny nose
Nazla ya behta howa naak
Difficulty in breathing /Fast respiratory rate
Sanns ma masla ya/taiz taiz sans ana
Convulsions
Jhatkay ana
Which danger sign, complication, problem or disease, has the baby had?
Fever
Bhukar
Hypothermia
Jisam thanda par jana
Lethargy or no movement
Thakan ya koi harkat na hona
Pustules
Phoray ka phinsian hona
Jaundice
Yarkan/peelia
Umbilical redness or discharge
Naaf wali jaga par laal nishan ya wahan sa khuch nikalna
Vomiting
Ultian ana
Diarrhea
Dast
Oral Thrush
Moun aur zeban par zakham hona
Irritability or too much crying
Chircharapan ya bhoot zayda rona
Redness of eyes or watery discharge
Ankhain laal hona ya ankhoun sa pani ana
Grunting
Gargarana
Lips / tongue turning blue or black
Zeban aur hount kalay ya neelay ho jana
Peripheral cyanosis
Haat ya paoun neelay par jana
Bleeding from nose
Naak sa khoon ana
Constipation
Qabz hona

Wo naam aik aik kar k yahan likhain

Agar bachay ko koi bh powder wali deewai di gay th tu wo kitnay din tak istimaal k gay

99 if do not know
88 if unnecessary
77 if not admitted
Agar bacha is doran hosptial ma dhakil howa tu kitnay dinoun k liya
What is the state of the baby’s health according to the family?
Well baby (Sahi ha)
Recovered from illness (beemari dur ho gay)
Still ill, but better than before (abhi bh beemar ha laikin pehlay sa behtar ha)
Condition has deteriorated (tabiyat aur kharan ho gay)
Is waqt bachay k sehat kaisi ha
Respiratory rate (00.0 if refused)If the respiratory rate is 60 or more (if age is 59 days of less) OR 50 or more (if age is greater than 59 days), count again and note the second respiratory rate
Sans lainay k raftar note karain Agar sans lainay k raftar 60 ya zayda ha tu aik daf phir note kar k likhain
Is the respiratory rate 60 or above on two different readings (if Age is less than 59 days?\nIs the respiratory rate 50 or above on two different readings (if Age greater than 59 days?

Uper liya janay wali sans lainay k raftar 60 ya us sa zayda ha 2 dafa ma (Agar bachay k umer 59 dinoun sa kaam ha)\nUper liya janay wali sans lainay k raftar 50 ya us sa zayda ha 2 dafa ma (Agar bachay k umer 59 dinoun sa zayda ha)
Severe chest indrawing – Is chest indrawing on every breath?
Shadeed sinay k harkat andar k taraf jab bacha sans laita ha
Is temperature on two different readings equal or greater than 38.8
Upper li gay doun readings 38.8 ya us sa zayda han
Is temperature on two different readings is less than 35.5
Upper li gay doun readings 35.5 sa kaam han
Check the movement of the baby
Normal movement (sahi harkat ha)
Movement only on stimulation (sirf chairnay par harkat ha)
No movement at all or unconscious (koi harkat nahi and bacha hosh ma nahi)
Bachay ki harkat check karain
Convulsions
According to the family, the baby had convulsions\n(bachay ko jhatkay partay han)
The baby had convulsions in your (health worker’s) presence\n(Bachay ko jhatkay ain han team k mojodgi ma)
No convulsions\nKoi jhatkay nahi
Jhatkay
Ask the mother if the baby is having problem in taking milk?
Mother has told that the baby has difficulty in breastfeeding\nMaa na bataya k bachay ko dhood peenay ma masla ha

Baby unable to feed due to illness\nBacha beemari k waja sa dhood nahi pee sak raha
Refused for assessment (Revisit)\nAssessment k liya mana kar diya
Maa sa pochain k agar bachay ko maa ka dhood peenay ma koi masla tu darpaish nahi ho raha
Ask the mother to feed the baby now and you (health worker) will observe
Maa ko bolain k wo bachay ko app ka samnay dhood pilai and nichay di gay bataoun ko note karain

Bacha k position kya team member na sahi k

Bacha bilkul dhood nahi pee saka

Chichirahat ya bhoot zayda rona

ankhain laal hona ya ankhoun sa pani nikalna

Hount ya zeban neeli ya kali hona

haatoun k unglian ya pair neelay hona

sans laitay howy awaz nikalna

Team member na in ma koi masla bachay ka noima kartay howa note kiya
According to the health worker, does the baby have any severe symptom for which immediate referral is needed or has been referred?
Team member k mutabiq bachay ko koi aisa masla ha jis k waja sa bachay ko foran tibbi maoinay k liya lay kar jana chahiya
Does the mother/family want a referral for their own satisfaction?
Bachay k maa apni tasali k liya khud lay kar jana chahti ha bachay ko
Did the health worker refer the baby based on the mother’s/ family’s concern or for her own satisfaction?
Team meber na bachay ko tibbi noimay k liya bhejwa diya
Did the parent/family of the baby accept the referral?\n(if the parent/family did not accept the referral, revisit the next day and guide)
Bachay k ghar waloun na is ka qabool kar liya\nAgar bachay k ghar waloun nahi maan rahay tu dobara un k ghar jain dosray din and un k mazeed rehnumai karain
Did not think the baby was sick enough to need health care
Un k mutabiq bacha itna beemar nahi ha k us ko sehat k markaz jana paray
No one available to go with the caregiver
Koi moujod nahi ha jo bachay k saath ja sakay
Too much time from her regular duties
Masroofiyat k waja sa
Someone else has to decide
Koi aur is baat ka faisla karay ga
Too far to travel
Bhoot dur jana parta ha
Reason for refusing the referral?
No transportation available
Kisi gari ka bandobast nahi ha
Cost (transport, health care, other)
Paisoun ka masla ha
Not satisfied with the available health care
Maoujooda sehat k nizam tasali baksh nahi ha
Problem requires traditional care
Bachay ko jo masla ha wo riwayti tareeqay sa theek ho jay ga
Thought baby was too sick to travel
Bacha bhoot beemar ha and dur nahi ja sakta
Thought baby will die no matter what
Bacha akhir kar mar jay ga khuch bh ho jay
Other (specify)
Koi aur masla
Mana karnay ka reason kya tha

Number of days since last visit. To be calculated from Q27 and today’s date

Total number of sachet supposed to be used by woman.System to calculate from Q28 multiply by 2

Sacchat k taadad jo kisi aur na istimaal kiya ghar ma ya ghar ma sa bahir kisi na
Compliance in % - System to calculate as, Value in Q31 divided by value in Q29 multiply by 100
Compliance k % Yeh system khudi calculate kar k likh day ga Q29 and Q31 ma dali gay entries k hisab sa

Consulted and confirmed by supervisor that no Azithromycin or any other antibiotic was given to the child\nSupervisor k mashwaray k baad confirm kar liya k di gay deewaiyoun ma sa koi bh Azithromycin ya koi aur antibiotic nahi ha

Consulted and confirmed that Azthirthomycin was given in the past few days\nSupervisor k mashwaray k baad confirm kar liya k di gay deewai Azithromycin hi th jo k pichaly khuch din ma bachay ko di gay ha
Consult with supervisor and discuss if any suspected medicine is Azithromycin
Supervisor sa rabta karain and confirm karain k in ma sa koi bh deewai Azithromycin tu nahi ha
Decided to be administered the dose today \nAj k tareekh ma bachay ko AZ ka dose day diya jay ga
Dose of Azithromycin in on hold for next seven \n AZ ka dose 7 din baad diya jay ga bachay ko
Consulted and confirmed that Azthirthomycin was given in the past few days
Supervisor k mashwaray k baad confirm kar liya k di gay deewai Azithromycin hi th jo k pichaly khuch din ma bachay ko di gay ha
Date when a supervisor communicated to administer the dose to the child
Wo tareekh likhain jis din supervisor na bola ha k bachay ko AZ daini ha
Inform and counsel the mother about Azithromycin
Maa ko bata diya AZ k baray ma
Weight of the child
Bachay ka wazan
Dose in Milligram
AZ ka dose mg ma
Dose in ml
AZ ka dose ml ma
Dose filled in the measuring oral syringe and administered?
AZ k dose syrings ma bhar k bachay ko moun sa pila diya gaya
Remaining amount of Azithromycin archived with the Study ID
Jo AZ k miqdar bottle ma bach gay us ko study ID k saath mehfooz kar liya gaya
Maamta product is balance protein and energy supplement for lactating women.
Maamta sachet aik protein based balanced energy supplement ha jo khaas tor pay dhood pilanay wali maoun k liya ha
Before use, try to press sealed sachet slowly with your fingers to soften this paste
Istimaal sa pehaly sachet ko haath sa achi tarhan daba k andar mojoud paste ko naram kar lain
Taste of product is sweet in nature, but consider it as a special product only design for lactating women.
Andar mojoud paste ka zaiqa thora sa meetha ha, jo k sirf aur sirf dhoodh pilanay wali maoun k liya banaya gaya ha
After eating this product, you may have improved breast milk to feed your child.
Is ko khanay k baad, Maa k dhood ma izafa ho ga takay app apnay bachay ko acha dhood pila sakain
It will only benefit, when you consume 2 complete sachets in a day for next 6 months and exclusively breastfeed your child.
Is ka zayda faida tab ho ga jab app 2 sacchets 1 din ma musalsal 6 mahinay tak istimaal karain and saath ma bachay ko sirf aur sirf ma aka dhood pilain
Key messages
Maamta product is designed only for lactating women, it may cause side effects if children and other adult member will use it.
Yeh product sirf aur sirf dhood pilanay wali maoun k liya banai gay ha, bachay ya kisi aur ko khilanay k surat ma koi bh muzir asraat ho saktay han
Do not share Maamta with anyone in the family, even in a small quantity
App ko jo sachet diya gaya ha us ko ghar ma kisi ko aur istimaal na karnay dain

You can eat Maamta directly from the sachet and save the remaining amount in a covered utensil or you may completely pour the sachet in a plate and eat it with spoon. Do not forget to cover the plate if amount is left over.
App Maamta sachet rookha bh kha sakti han, ya plate ma nikal k chamchay sa bh. Agar istimal k baad thori miqdar sacchay ma bach jay tu sachet ko bund kar k rakh lain ya phir plate ko dhak k rakhain
If you develop any type of rash, diarrhea, vomiting or any other unusual sign and symptoms, please immediately contact us
Agar maamta khanay k baad app ko kisi bh kisam ka masla ho maslan pait kharab, ulti, jisam pay laal nishan ana, tu foran hum sa rabta karain
Unused portion of Maamta sachet should be consumed within a day and save the empty sachet in a bag provided to you
Maamta sachay kholnay k baad aik din k andar andar istimaal kar laina chahiya, and istimal k baad khali sachet ko sambhal k rakahin appnay pass
Our team will provide you 14 days supply, which you have to consume according to instructions
Hamari team app ko 14 din k sachet faraham karay gee jo k app na di gay hidayaat k mutabiq istimal karna ha
Empty sachet will be collected by the team
Yaad rahay k khali sachet hamari team app sa jama karay gee tu un ko hifazat sa rakahin
